trustfund:
TF023573-BOSNIA & HERZEGOVINA:
            EMERGENCY PILOT CREDIT PROJECT,TF021199-REPUBLIKA SRPSKA - EMERGENCY
            PILOT CREDIT (RS) PROJECT,TF020219-BOSNIA & HERZEGOVINA -
            EMERGENCY PILOT CREDIT PROJECT,TF020521-EMERGENCY PILOT CREDIT PROJECT
            IN BOSNIA & HERZEGOVINA

abstracts.cdata!:
The Emergency Pilot Credit Project seeks
            to restart and expand enterprise activities in RS (Republika
            Srpska) through medium-term loans from commercial banks, and
            to improve credit management capacity and loan
            administration skills of RS banks. There are five project
            components. First, the line of credit component will provide
            emergency financing for needed inputs and repairs to permit
            small and medium scale majority private enterprises in the
            RS to restart or increase production to meet rising demand.
            Second, the bankers' training component will provide
            technical assistance to participating RS banks. The
            technical assistance will focus in the areas of credit
            management, credit evaluation, and adaptation to
            international standards. Third, the enterprise support
            component will develop viable business plans and strategies
            to enhance the quality of sub-loan requests. Fourth, the
            banking supervision component will apply prudential
            regulations and accounting frameworks, introduce new
            examination techniques, and develop risk management
            capacity. Fifth, the implementation support will finance
            administrative expenditures and technical assistance for the
            credit line section of the Project Coordination Unit.
